title: Henry.Portrait.Of.A.Serial.Killer.UncutUncensored - AliaIactaEst
description:
AliaIactaEst 

Hello all: 

Here it is. A film that disturbed me so deeply, I HAD to add it to my library of great films, and I want to share it with you. 

A chilling account, based loosely on real life serial killer Henry Lucas who claims to have killed hundreds of people across America. 

When I first saw this film - I was left haunted, feeling as though I had watched something real.  It felt snuff-like, and moments within the film I felt should have crawled with disclaimers, telling me that it was just fiction. 

A BRILLIANT piece of Cinema Verite. 

Michael Rooker deserved an Academy Award for his portrayal. 

I also added in a rare interview with Director John McNaughton about the making of Henry: Portrait Of A Serial Killer 

This one shook me up - no fooling... 

Video: .avi 
Audio: mp3 
Aspect: 4:3 
Quality: High 

Enjoy - if you can... 

AliaIactaEst
